responsibilities: Created an app that connects African exporters to international traders
Maintained server infrastructure on AWS

Created an inventory management app to keep track of all products in stock
Integrated it with Shopify to manage product stock on hand, customer orders, users and etc
Created a recommendation system that suggests purchase orders to suppliers, notifies staff when stock is low and calculates inventory data
Created a wholesale store website and integrated it with Shopify

Maintaining infrastructure on AWS
Created a CRM app to manage products, customers, sales, stores and warehouses. Added features including registering product defects, shipping, warranty cases and etc

Developed a dashboard with charts and data

Solved hundreds of issues: bug fixes and new feature requests

footerText: I'm a practical person so if you have a cool project to work on or share the feeling that I could be a good fit with your team, reach out and let's have a chat!

education.role: Bachelor of Applied Science (B.A.Sc.), Computer science

bioTitle: A lifetime hobby turned into a profession!
bio: I still remember my first encounter with programming in elementary school at the age of 8. At 12, I was enrolled to a programming course. I wrote small scripts and apps using Pascal.
In 2004, I built my first website about the history of Earth. It wasn't great but it made me realize my passion for programming. That led me toward getting a Bachelor degree in Computer Science.
Fast forward to today, I build web applications as a freelance full-stack web developer.

seo.title: Nikolai Kiselev | Full-Stack Web Developer
seo.desc: Nikolai Kiselev is a full-stack web developer who builds modern and secure web applications.
